page.title: 20SOCIAL CONCERNS IN HAMBLEDON
page.content: A sample survey of the households in the study area was undertaken and these are the trends that were noted: {Hambledon}has an ageing population, with a high proportion of residents of pensionable age. A small core of residents have lived in{Hambledon}all their lives as their parents and grandparents did. Many residents commute to Portsmouth, Southampton and London and many others have retired here from S. England. Therefore, house prices have risen and some {Hambledon}born residents cannot buy a home there. {ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS: We would like to {thank all the residents of Hambledon {for their interest and cooperation.
